name: twitter
label: Twitter Username
description: The Twitter Username (no @) to link on the site template. Leave this empty to remove the Twitter feed.

name: tagline
label: Header Tagline
description: The tagline under the site name in the website header.

name: logo
label: Logo
description: The logo image used for the theme header. The default dimensions are 940x198. Supports .jpg, .jpeg, and .png files.

name: space_1
label: Space 1
description: This setting controls the homepage. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.

name: space_sidebar
label: Space Sidebar
description: This setting controls the space in the sidebar and on the homepage below the search box. You can choose from any boxes you have made.
